name: Fantasy Cop: Origins - DEMO
description:
Retford, a very peaceful country, is turned upside-down when Prince Chaol's fiancée goes missing right before his birthday party. Join Francene and Kenzor as they go on a cliché RPG adventure to rescue that princess!

Play this game for awesome things like:

  • Default graphics (mostly)
  • Light-hearted story with no respect for logic or the fourth wall
  • Flavour text everywhere
  • Dance battles with bandits
  • Ninjas... lots of them

Why is this called Fantasy Cop when there's no cops to be found?

IMPORTANT!

This is a demo. Things may change in the full version of the game, though many of the desired mechanics are already in place. The demo has the first town, dungeon and boss.

Credits in Credits.txt.  Not NSFW, but there are explicit sexual references.
